title: Haas F1 eyeing US Grand Prix as 'home race' in 2016 debut
text: Haas F1 eyeing US Grand Prix as 'home race' in 2016 debut Saturday, 24 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) Guenther Steiner was surrounded by men in red drinking coffee and picking over the lunch buffet between practice sessions at the United States Grand Prix. The name over the door above was Scuderia Ferrari. Top 19 Quotes On Sachin By Celebrities 01:46 Tendulkar was born on April 24, 1973. He made his Test debut in 1989 at the age of 16. He later represented Mumbai at home and India internationally for nearly 24 years. We, team of SportsCurry wishes Sachin Ramesh Tendulkar a special Happy Birthday.
